JSON_Data: {"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Investment","Service Fees":"2000 SAR/ yearn5 years maximum","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.nu2022 Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.nu2022 Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. nu2022 Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.nu2022 Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.nu2022 A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.nu2022 Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.nu2022 Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Provision of a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following year/years.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist already.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment. ."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial register","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Commerce","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification ","Service Duration":"Depending on the1 entity classification ","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022Applicant must be 18 years old or above.nu2022The employee must not be a governmental employee.nu2022The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.nu2022It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.nIssuing the main register requires the following:nu2022 Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.nu2022 Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.nu2022 Presence of a national ID.nIssuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:nu2022Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.nu2022Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.nIssuing a branch register requires:nu2022 Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.nu2022 Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.","Service Description":"A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Registeration with relevant governmental entities ","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, ZATCA  Saudi Post| SPLnThe General Organization for Social Insurance","Service Fees":"Depending on the investor type","Service Duration":"Depending on the investor type","Conditions/Requirements":"nu2022tPresence of a valid commercial register.","Service Description":"Establishments and companies shall be automatically registered after issuing the commercial registration at the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, ZATCA, the General Organization for Social Insurance, and the Saudi Post.","Additional Information":"This step is illustrative and gets activated automatically "}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of the initial license","Ministry Involved":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","Service Fees":"2000 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"The requirements and prerequisites for obtaining and renewing a healthcare license, or modifying it by transferring location or ownership to another investor, include the following:nnValid commercial registration.nValid commercial activity license.nGovernmental approval/license.nFounding contract for companies.nSafety certificate issued by the Civil Defense.nCompliance certificate issued by the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development.nSubsidiary commercial registration under the name of the training facility, starting with the words "Center" or "Institute" and ending with a word related to training.nAll partners must be Saudi nationals or citizens of GCC countries.nTraining should be provided free of charge.nFulfilling the main requirements from relevant authorities (Ministry of Commerce, Saudi Post, Ministry of Investment).nProviding all information and data according to approved templates.nThe training facility should not be used as a means to obtain any form of material or monetary support or solicit donations.nThe system should allow training to be provided to non-employees.nAppointing a legal agent for the institution or company, or an authorized representative.nAdditional requirements for foreign investors include:nnPossessing an investment license for the training sector from the Ministry of Investment.nThe company or entity should be specialized in training and officially registered in the home country.nThe company should have at least one year of experience in the field of training.","Service Description":"Obtaining the initial approval after verifying that the necessary conditions for issuing a training license are met.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis action requires payment.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Designation of an engineering office","Ministry Involved":"No data available","Service Fees":"Depending on the office ","Service Duration":"Depending on the Office ","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Appointment of an approved engineering office to obtain construction and safety plans in accordance with the Saudi code.","Additional Information":"This step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a license to practice commercial activity and a safety certificate","Ministry Involved":"nMOMRAHnCivil Defense","Service Fees":"Depending on the activity classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant ","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a valid commercial register.nPresence of a permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.nPresence of articles of association of the companies.nPresence of the title deed or the lease contract if there is an office.nApplicant shall not be prohibited from practicing the activity.nApplicant shall be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.nApplicant shall be committed to updating the data in the system.nApplicant shall be able to request issuance of a license for his shop on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal proxy.nApplicant shall ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding (remove on him.)nThe attached documents shall match the original copies.","Service Description":"Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data required to conduct the  activity, and inspecting the site to to ensure it is licensed in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis action requires payment.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Request of activitation of training programs","Ministry Involved":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","Service Fees":"5000 SAR, including application study  and  visit","Service Duration":"1-5 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a (remove commercial) municipal license.nSubmission of an activation request, provided that there is no sanction preventing authorization.nObtainment of certificate of alignement from the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development (certificate of a work environment that supports the work of individuals with disabilities) for private training facilities.nSubmission of the approval of the Civil Defense unless previously submitted.nApproval of the necessary equipment for activation in accordance with the requirements of the training program.nApproval of the necessary training body  for activation in accordance with the requirements of the training program.nApproval of the necessary administrative body for activation, unless previously approved.nAll information and data shall be filled out in accordance with the approved forms.","Service Description":"Requesting the activation of training programs, ensuring that they conform to standards, are free of any gaps, and working to improve the deliverables and amending what is necessary.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.n1000 SAR is paid for each program or training field.n1000 SAR is paid for each additional visit."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Field visit to verify readiness ","Ministry Involved":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","Service Fees":"Included in step (7)","Service Duration":"Included in step (7)","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Specialists visit to follow up on the work progress and verify (remove the level of) readiness, in order to ensure quality and achieve the required standards.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Activation of training programs","Ministry Involved":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","Service Fees":"Included in step (7)","Service Duration":"Included in step (7)","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Activating the training programs after ensuring that they conform to the standards, are free of any loopholes, and pay the fees.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Technical and Vocational Training Corporation","License Name":"Training Facility License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.","ISIC Number":"853040- 854954","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Endorsement of cadres visas","Ministry Involved":"Technical and  Vocational Training Corporation","Service Fees":"Free ","Service Duration":"1-3 days","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Submitting a request to endorse granting of visa credits for the recruitment of facilities workers.","Additional Information":"This step is not mandatory for issuing the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Culture","License Name":"Playing a musical instrument license ","License Description":"This service enables the investor to practice the activity of playing music at events.","ISIC Number":"No data available","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License application","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of CulturenMusic Commission","Service Fees":"Included in the license issuance step","Service Duration":"No data available","Conditions/Requirements":" General Conditions:n* The practitioner shall pay the fees when applying for and renewing the license, and to pay any financial rights stipulated by the law.n* The practitioner shall comply with copyright and other local regulations, and with the original music content created.n* The practitioner shall initiate renewal procedures 20 days before the expiry date of the license, and is not entitled to practice the activity after the expiry of the license if it is not renewed.n* The issued license shall indicate the type of licensed activity, and the license holder shall abide by the type of activity specified for him.n* The Music Commission shall be notified of any change in the licensee's data, or the information contained in the license.n* The Music Commission shall be provided with all the reports, data, information, studies, or statistics related to the licensed activity.n* The license application shall be filled out.n*  The license is subject to cancellation according to the following:n- If the delay in renewing the license exceeds a period of 6 months after the expiry of its term without presenting an acceptable excuse.n- If the licensee died, and the heirs did not claim the license to continue and change its ownership to another party, after 6 months from the end of the license suspension period.n- If a penalty is issued that includes revocation or temporary suspension of the license from any judicial authority or relevant committees.n- If the entity or practitioner requests to cancel the license, bearing in mind that the fees are not refundable regardless of the remaining period of the license.n- If the profession is not practiced for a full year without an acceptable excuse.n- If the licensee breaches the conditions.n*No one shall play (original) music without obtaining a license from the issuing authority, and it is also necessary to obtain the required licenses from other government entities according to the rules and regulations.nnSpecial Conditions:n* The presence of the Nationa ID, or residency and passport of the foreigner.n* Evidence of sufficient academic qualifications shall be provided.nProvide reliable certificates of the practitioner's experience and qualifications in playing music.n* A high-quality video, with clear sound, and a recent date of no more than 7 days shall be provided, in which the applicant's face with the musical instrument appears clearly and completely, showing the hands of the performer during the performance. The duration of the video shall range from 45 seconds and not more than a minute and a half.n* The singing performance is allowed to be accompanied by a musical instrument.n*  Proof of sufficient experience shall be providedn* The type of performance shall be specified.n* The performance shall be solo and not accompanied by any other musical instrument.n* The practitioner shall not be allowed to record inside audio studios.","Service Description":"Submitting a request to obtain a license to play music on the (Abde'a) platform.nhttps://abdea.moc.gov.sa/site/","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not existnThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Provision of a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 The product specifications shall be in conformity with the Saudi, Gulf or international specifications.nu2022 The applicant shall not have final decisions issued against him due to violations of the provisions of the system inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 The license applicant shall abide by the conditions and undertakings attached to the investment license application form.nu2022 Granting the license shall achieve investment objectives and apply these conditions and controls to license renewal requests.nu2022 To be a foreign investor with a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom.nu2022 The presence of the commercial registration and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by the competent authorities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Presence of the commercial register to prove the profession or an extract from the civil status.nu2022 Presence of articles of association of a limited liability company.nu2022 Presence of Articles of Association of the joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of a passport for the general manager.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 Submitting the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the names of the partners, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of the activity.nu2022Appointing the general manager and determining his powers, certified by the competent authorities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Providing initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Providing a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submitting a budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom for a period of not less than 3 years, showing the soundness of the financial situation, approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom's embassy.nu2022 Evidence of the financial ability to invest in proportion to the capital of the project and the share of each partner and in accordance with the action plan submitted.nu2022 Reserving a trade name from the Ministry of Commerce."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Culture ","License Name":"License of the activity of the literary agency, if there is an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to engage in the activity of a literary agency to represent the author and play the role of mediator between him and the beneficiaries of his intellectual output, such as publishing houses, film, television, music or advertising companies, etc., with the aim of enabling the author to obtain the best possible return on his writings, according to the best legal, contractual and marketing practices that preserve his rights.","ISIC Number":"702013.0","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License application","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of CulturenLiterature, Publishing and Translation Commission ","Service Fees":"2000 SAR/ year","Service Duration":"30 days","Conditions/Requirements":"General Conditions:n* Having a municipal commercial license.n* Pesence of an investment license in case the investor is a foreigner.n* The holder of the license shall initiate the renewal 3 months before the expiry date, and he is not entitled to practice the activity as of the expiry date of the license without renewing it.n* The license holder shall practice the activity specified in the license, and put it in a prominent place in the licensed shop.n* The owner of the facility shall be able to keep a statement that includes the names of the workers in the facility, their nationalities, and the type of work of each of them, and shall enable the authorityu2019s inspectors to view this statement and any other documents related to the workers.n* The owner of the license shall be the first responsible person for the management of the store and its branches, and for all violations that occur in it.n* The activity of the commercial register shall have the ISIC-4 number (702013), under the name of the activity of administrative consulting services.n* The foreign investor shall obtain an initial license to invest in the Kingdom, according to the foreign capital investment regulations.n* The Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission shall be provided with all the reports, data, information, studies, or statistics related to the licensed activity it requests.n* The Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission shall be notified of any change in the licensee's data, or the information contained in it.n* - If a penalty is issued that includes canceling the license.n- If the activity has not been practiced after 6 months from the date of issuance of the license.n* The license applicant shall not practice the activity without obtaining a license from the Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission. He is also required to obtain the necessary licenses from other government agencies according to the rules and regulations.n* The license shall not be assigned to a third party or partner shall not be introduced without the approval of the Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission.nspecial conditions:n* The agent shall maintain bank accounts for each client to deposit dues, and pay dues in a certain period of time agreed upon by both parties","Service Description":"Submitting a request to obtain a literary agency activity license through the (Abde'a) platform.nhttps://abdea.moc.gov.sa/site/","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Licensing of local and international parcels shipping in the absence of an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to provide parcel transportation services inside and outside the Kingdom.","ISIC Number":"532012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License issuance","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"150,000 SAR","Service Duration":"30 days","Conditions/Requirements":"* That the commercial registration of the establishment be valid, and that it includes the activity of transporting parcels (local and international). n * That the license applicant adhere to the general specifications and provisions stipulated in the guide issued by the entity n* To agree to the declaration form related to financial integrity and lack of criminal record.n* The license applicant must agree to inquire about him through the SIMAH system and list system.n* Payment of the financial fee.n * Submission of an operational plan for the project that includes the following:n- Geographical coverage within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.n- The expected number of dispatches internally and externally, and the quarterly expansion plan for a period of two years.n- The rules and regulations of the company that will practice the activity.n- The Memorandum of Association is documented and the percentage of ownership is indicated in it. n* Providing documents related to the applicantu2019s international branches, owned by him in 5 countries and 5 different continents, provided that each country has one processing center as a minimum, or submitting a document of the relationship with the international facility licensed in the country of origin, and linked to the guarantee or franchise as an exclusive agent and her experience should not be less than 5 years in this field, and the document indicates the following: - International facility data includes (the name of the facility - the country of origin - the main headquarters).n- A founding contract for the international facility is documented and explained by ownership rates.n- The locations of the international facility in the countries of the world.n- The website of the international establishment.n- The major shipments assembly points outside the Kingdom include (the treatment center - the state - the address - the license issued by the country of origin).n- Executive director and international branches managers and communication information with them.n- The person authorized for the international facility, the data of communication with him and his identity.n- The mechanism of work, the method of delivering, receiving and delivering parcels.","Service Description":"Obtaining the license after verifying the completeness of the documents and fulfilling the necessary conditions. n","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Licensing of local and international parcels shipping in the absence of an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to provide parcel transportation services inside and outside the Kingdom.","ISIC Number":"532012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Endorsement of cadres visas","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development","Service Fees":"Depending on number of visas","Service Duration":"14 days","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Submitting an application for cadres visas.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist..nThis step is not mandatory for issuing the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Licensing of local and international parcels shipping in the absence of an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to provide parcel transportation services inside and outside the Kingdom.","ISIC Number":"532012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a license to transport goods on the roads","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Undefined","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Carrying out the activity of transporting goods on land roads.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis step is not mandatory for issuing the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Licensing of local and international parcels shipping in the absence of an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to provide parcel transportation services inside and outside the Kingdom.","ISIC Number":"532012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Truck registration","Ministry Involved":"Transport General AuthoritynGeneral Department of Traffic","Service Fees":"Undefined","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Registering trucks with the Traffic Department and the Transport General Authority to organize their traffic, create a new reservation, search for or cancel a previous reservation. n","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis step is not mandatory for issuing the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Licensing of local and international parcels shipping in the absence of an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to provide parcel transportation services inside and outside the Kingdom.","ISIC Number":"532012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of air transport license for goods","Ministry Involved":"General Authority of Civil Aviation","Service Fees":"100,000 SAR","Service Duration":"105 days","Conditions/Requirements":"* Submit a bank account statement.n* Providing a statement of the identity of the main employees.n* Submit a list of branches.n* Provide the list of shares owned or controlled by the applicant in any of the air carrier (foreign air carrier - joint air carrier), or any person who participates in the activities in the field of aviation.n* Providing the company's financial statements for the last 3 years.","Service Description":"Carrying out the activity of transporting goods by air freight.","Additional Information":"This step is not mandatory for issuing the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Investment","Service Fees":"2000 SAR/ yearn5 years maximum","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.nu2022 Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.nu2022 Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. nu2022 Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.nu2022 Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.nu2022 A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.nu2022 Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.nu2022 Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Provision of a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuance of an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.ttttnThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.ttttnThis procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial register","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Commerce","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification","Service Duration":"Depending on the entity classification","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022Applicant must be 18 years old or above.nu2022The employee must not be a governmental employee.nu2022The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.nu2022It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.nIssuing the main register requires the following:nu2022 Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.nu2022 Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.nu2022 Presence of a national ID.nIssuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:nu2022Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.nu2022Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.nIssuing a branch register requires:nu2022 Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.nu2022 Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.","Service Description":"A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.ttttnThis procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Registeration with government entities","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social DevelopmentnThe Zakat, Tax and Customs AuthoritynSaudi Post | SPLnThe General Organization for Social Insurance","Service Fees":"Depending on the investor type","Service Duration":"Depending on the investor type","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 Presence of a valid commercial register.","Service Description":"Establishments and companies are automatically registered after issuing the commercial registration at the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority, the General Organization for Social Insurance, and the Saudi Post.","Additional Information":"This step is illustrative."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a restricted license","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Initial approval to start commercial activity procedures to obtain the final license.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.ttttnThis procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Designation of an engineering office","Ministry Involved":"No data available","Service Fees":"Depending on the office","Service Duration":"Depending on the office","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Appointment of an approved engineering office to obtain construction and safety plans in accordance with the Saudi code.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires payment.ttttnThis step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance.ttttnThe following steps can be skipped in case of renting a building:ttttnSite endorsement.ttttnIssuance of a building permit.ttttnConnecting water and electricity.ttttnIssuance an occupancy certificate."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Site approval","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","Service Fees":"Depending to the activity classification + surbey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Obtaining the approval of the planning authority in the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing on the site on which the activity is to be established.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.ttttnThis procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment.ttttnttttntttt"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a building permit","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","Service Fees":"Depending to the activity classification + surbey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of an updated deed from the Ministry of Justice, a housing contract, or an investment contract.nPresence of a cadastral decision for the purpose of building.nSubmission of the municipality license if there is an office.nHiring a designer from an engineering office.nHiring a supervisor from an engineering office.nHiring a building contractor.nPledging implementing thermal insulation.nPaying service fees.","Service Description":"Obtaining a building permit to carry out construction works.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment.ttttnThe engineering office is chosen by my platform.ttttnPeriodic inspections of construction procedures are carried out by the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing.tttt"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Connecting water and electricity","Ministry Involved":"National Water CompanynSaudi Electricity Company","Service Fees":"Depending on the facility","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"Preparing the meter installation site according to the company's technical requirements, including removing the cables according to the approved sizes.nImplementation of thermal insulation according to the company's requirements.nGrounding implementation.","Service Description":"Connecting water and electricity services upon completion of 75% of the construction work, according to the instructions and specified requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment.ttttnPeriodic inspections of construction procedures are carried out by the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing.ttttnThe service receipt request is accepted by receiving the completion notice through the Baladi platform only.tttt"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an occupancy certificate","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","Service Fees":"400 SAR + Survey fees 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"Contracting with an engineering office.nPaying service fees.nPresence a building permit.","Service Description":"Issuance of a certificate documenting the establishments' compliance with safety requirements and standards.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Field inspection to check the safety of the building","Ministry Involved":"Civil Defense","Service Fees":"150 SAR","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Ensure the application of safety requirements and adherence to security instructions.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial activity license and safety certificate","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and HousingnCivil Defense","Service Fees":"Depending to the activity classification + surbey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"5 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Having a valid commercial register.nA permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.nPresence of articles of incorporation for companies.nPresence of the title deed or lease contract in the case of an office.nTo not be prohibited from practicing the activity.nTo be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.nTo be committed to updating the data in the system.nTo be able to request the issuance of a license for his shop on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal agency.nTo ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding on him.nThat the attached documents match their originals.","Service Description":"Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site to be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment.ttttntttt"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Obtainment of a vehicle approval letter","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Obtaining an approval letter from the Transport General Authority after reviewing the technical specifications of the vehicle, and ensuring that it conforms to the required conditions and specifications.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Connecting the facility's system with Wasl platform","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Depending on the company","Service Duration":"Depending on the company","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Equipping vehicles with tracking systems through a qualified company and linking them to Wasl platform, with the aim of organizing and managing transport operations in a safe and effective manner, and linking establishments operating in the sector with regulatory authorities.","Additional Information":"A number of companies are being qualified to provide connectivity services with the Wasl platform by the Transport General Authority."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a zakat or tax certificate","Ministry Involved":"The Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority","Service Fees":"Depending on dues","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"More than one year has passed in the commercial register to obtain the certificate.","Service Description":"Fill out the application form for obtaining a zakat or tax certificate through the electronic portal of the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment.ttttnThis step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License issuance","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"10,000 SAR","Service Duration":"2 days","Conditions/Requirements":"* The license applicant must abide by the regulations specified by the Transport General Authority  and the regulations stipulated in any other bylaw.n* The application must be submitted by the facility through the channels of the Transport General Authority.n* The cars must be new and have not been previously registered inside or outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and the specifications approved by the President of the General Transport Authority determine the operating age of the taxis.n* That a suitable center be provided in the city in accordance with the requirements of the approved municipality, and the requirements issued by the relevant  authorities.n* That the minimum number of cars necessary to carry out the activity is provided according to the specifications approved by the Chairman of the Transport General Authority, provided that the minimum number is directly owned by the facility, or through financial leasing contracts, provided that the facility is the actual user of the car.n* That 2% of the total number of cars in the facility be provided for persons with mobility disabilities and the elderly, with at least one car that conforms to the specifications approved by the Chairman of the Transport General Authority.n* To be registered in the (Naql) portal.n* Payment of fees","Service Description":"Obtaining the license after verifying the completeness of the documents.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Obtainment of vehicle operating cards","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"* Having a valid driver's license.n* Presence of a valid periodic technical examination certificate.n* Presence of a valid car insurance policy.n* Presentation of the customs card for the facility's car.n* Proof of identification for the individual.n* Proof  proof of the individual's occupation.n* Payment of financial penalties, if any.n* The car must be intended for transporting passengers, according to the required specifications.n* That the individual's car be linked to an authorized steering office, and the facility's car is linked to its automated system dedicated to tracking and steering its cars at the establishment's headquarters, or contracting with one of the steering offices qualified by the Transport General Authority to direct cars on its behalf.n* The establishment's license to practice the activity must be valid.","Service Description":"A digital document that qualifies the vehicle to work in any activity supervised by the Transport General Authority.","Additional Information":"This step is not mandatory for Issuance the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"Public fare licence","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492211","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Obtainment of drivers cards","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"A digital document that qualifies the driver to work in any activity supervised by the Transport General Authority.","Additional Information":"This step is not mandatory for Issuance the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"A license to transport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport and deport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492281","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial activity license and safety certificate","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and HousingnCivil Defense","Service Fees":"Depending on the activity classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"5 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Having a valid commercial register.nA permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.nPresence of articles of incorporation for companies.nPresence of the title deed or lease contract in the case of an office.nTo not be prohibited from practicing the activity.nTo be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.nTo be committed to updating the data in the system.nTo be able to request the issuance of a license for his shop on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal agency.nTo ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding on him.nThat the attached documents match their originals.","Service Description":"Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site to be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"A license to transport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport and deport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492281","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Obtainment of a letter of approval for the buses","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Obtaining an approval letter from the Transport General Authority after reviewing the technical specifications of the bus, and ensuring that it conforms to the required conditions and specifications.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"A license to transport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport and deport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492281","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Bus registration in traffic","Ministry Involved":"General Department of Traffic","Service Fees":"Undefined","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Bus registration in traffic to obtain ownership papers.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires payment.ttttnVehicles are inspected to issue a certificate of technical inspection, and a certificate is not required for inspection if the buses have customs cards, or no more than two years have passed since their first registration in the Kingdom.tttt"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"A license to transport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport and deport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492281","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a zakat or tax certificate","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Depending on dues","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"More than one year has passed in the commercial register to obtain the certificate.","Service Description":"Fill out the application form for obtaining a zakat or tax certificate through the electronic portal of the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"A license to transport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport and deport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492281","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of the operating license","Ministry Involved":"Transport General Authority","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"2 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Amending the terms and conditions to be...n* Presence of a valid commercial register for the establishment.n* That a suitable center be provided in the city in accordance with the requirements of the approved municipality, and the requirements issued by the relevant competent authorities.n* That a minimum of 5 buses be provided to practice the activity, provided that its operational life does not exceed 10 years from the date of manufacture.n* The vehicle must be directly owned by the establishment or through financial leasing contracts, provided that the establishment is the actual user of it.n* The license applicant must abide by any electronic systems specified by the Transport General Authority.n* The fees and fines, if any, must be paid.","Service Description":"Obtaining the operating license after verifying the documents.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"A license to transport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport and deport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom for a fee.","ISIC Number":"492281","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Activation of the facility's subscription to the Shomoos system","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Interior","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Activating the subscription to the Shomoos electronic system, through which data is recorded and information is transmitted electronically to the competent authorities.","Additional Information":"This step is not mandatory for issuing the license, but is required to run the activity.ttttnThe owner of the facility should go to the search and investigation unit in his area and present the reference number, the letter of the licensing authority, a copy of the ID, and a copy of the license."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"License to drive passenger vehicles","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to direct taxis or private cars to transport passengers for a fee, using smart device applications.","ISIC Number":"522922","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor","Ministry Involved":"MInistry of Investment","Service Fees":"2000 SAR/ yearn5 years maximum","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.nu2022 Applicant shall not have application form.nu2022 Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. nu2022 Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.nu2022 Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.nu2022 A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.nu2022 Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.nu2022 Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.ttttnThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.ttttnThis procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Transport General Authority","License Name":"License to drive passenger vehicles","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to direct taxis or private cars to transport passengers for a fee, using smart device applications.","ISIC Number":"522922","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial register","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Commerce","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification","Service Duration":"Depending on the entity classification","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022Applicant must be 18 years old or above.nu2022The employee must not be a governmental employee.nu2022The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.nu2022It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.nIssuing the main register requires the following:nu2022 Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.nu2022 Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.nu2022 Presence of a national ID.nIssuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:nu2022Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.nu2022Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.nIssuing a branch register requires:nu2022 Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.nu2022 Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.","Service Description":"A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.ttttnThis procedure is automated.ttttnThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Ports Authority","License Name":"Marine agent activity license","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.","ISIC Number":"522912","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Authentication of the agency contract document","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Foreign Affairs","Service Fees":"Undefined","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Authentication of the document from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.","Additional Information":"No data available"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Ports Authority","License Name":"Marine agent activity license","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.","ISIC Number":"522912","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Request to issue an operational license","Ministry Involved":"Saudi Ports Authority","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"2 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a valid commercial register, adding the name of the activity.nPresence of the identity number of the delegate/manager, which is linked to the commercial register of the establishment.nRegistration in the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority.nPayment the fees for issuing or renewing the license.nAppointing an executive director of Saudi nationals in the field of managing marine agencies during the validity period of the license.nSubmission of a strategic action plan to increase quantities and develop business in Saudi ports, including the required Saudization rates, within a maximum period of 90 days from the date of issuance of the license.nSubmission of a valid bank guarantee in favor of the management of the port in which the activity is to be practiced, irrevocable, unconditional and without restrictions, in the amount of 500,000 riyals for the period of validity of the license, and 3 months after its expiry.nThe (foreign) license applicant must be the owner or operator of a shipping line, taking into account the foreign investment law and the relevant decisions.nThe license applicant must comply with all instructions and regulations issued by the General Authority for Ports and the port administrations in which he works.nThe license applicant must submit all information and data required by the General Authority for Ports.nThe license applicant is committed to developing Saudi human resources, training them, and enabling them to occupy leadership positions with him.nThe license applicant shall not transfer any activities or businesses related to the practice of maritime agencies outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.nThe license applicant shall be obligated to provide all information and data in the event of any material changes to the entity during the validity period of the license.nThe license applicant undertakes his full responsibility as a fine for any act or negligence committed by him personally, or by one of his employees that harms the port, its facilities, or any damages affecting port employees, or any third party within the borders of the port, and compensating for any resulting losses unconditionally .nThe license applicant shall be committed to paying and settling all his financial obligations to the Saudi Ports Authority, the port in which he works, and outsourcing contractors within 15 days from the date of issuance of any invoice or financial claims, taking into account the agreements signed between the relevant parties.nThe license applicant must provide accurate data to the port administration and importers on the movement of ships belonging to his agency, and to inform them of the dates of their arrival at Saudi ports.nThat the license applicant undertakes to practice the activity within a period not exceeding 90 days from the date of issuance or renewal of the license.nThe license applicant must achieve a Saudization rate of not less than 60% of the administrative and leadership positions during the validity period of the license.","Service Description":"Submitting a request to issue a license on the Fasah platform after submitting the required documents.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.ttttnThis procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Health","License Name":"Licensing public medical complexes if there is an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew, and cancel the health license, or amend it by adding a health specialty or activity to the facility, or transfer the location or ownership of the license to another investor, in the places prepared to receive patients, examine them, and treat them, and in which at least three different medical specialties are available, One of the following basic specializations: surgery - internal diseases - obstetrics and gynecology - Pediatrics - family medicine.","ISIC Number":"862063","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance an investment license for the foreign investor","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Investment","Service Fees":"2000 SAR/ yearn5 years maximum","Service Duration":"One Day","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.nu2022 Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.nu2022 Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. nu2022 Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.nu2022 Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.nu2022 A association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Provision of a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Health","License Name":"Licensing public medical complexes if there is an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew, and cancel the health license, or amend it by adding a health specialty or activity to the facility, or transfer the location or ownership of the license to another investor, in the places prepared to receive patients, examine them, and treat them, and in which at least three different medical specialties are available, One of the following basic specializations: surgery - internal diseases - obstetrics and gynecology - Pediatrics - family medicine.","ISIC Number":"862063","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial register","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Commerce","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification","Service Duration":"Depending on the entity classification","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022Applicant must be 18 years old or above.nu2022The employee must not be a governmental employee.nu2022The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.nu2022It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.nIssuing the main register requires the following:nu2022 Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.nu2022 Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.nu2022 Presence of a national ID.nIssuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:nu2022Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.nu2022Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.nIssuing a branch register requires:nu2022 Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.nu2022 Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.","Service Description":"A legal document that contains the investors's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 {"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Energy","License Name":"License for Energy Audit Services Provider for Industrial Facilities","License Description":"This service enables investors to acquire a license that authorizes them to offer data review and energy audit services for industrial facilities. Additionally, it encompasses the provision of energy design review services.","ISIC Number":"711083-711086","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuing a Commercial Registration","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Commerce","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification","Service Duration":"Depending on the entity classification","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022Applicant must be 18 years old or above.nu2022The employee must not be a governmental employee.nu2022The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.nu2022It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.nIssuing the main register requires the following:nu2022 Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.nu2022 Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.nu2022 Presence of a national ID.nIssuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:nu2022Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.nu2022Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.nIssuing a branch register requires:nu2022 Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.nu2022 Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.","Service Description":"A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist."}"}
