{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Energy","License Name":"License for Energy Audit Services Provider for Industrial Facilities","License Description":"This service enables investors to acquire a license that authorizes them to offer data review and energy audit services for industrial facilities. Additionally, it encompasses the provision of energy design review services.","ISIC Number":"711083-711086","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License application","Ministry Involved":"Saudi Energy Efficiency Center","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 Create an account on the Saudi Energy Efficiency Center portal.nu2022 Fill out the application form and the required sections (the company's experience and projects - staff capabilities - technical capabilities - company account registration information), in addition to submitting the documents shown in the form.nu2022 Recruitment of a full-time manager with at least 5 years of experience in energy auditing; {"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Energy","License Name":"Permit to export petroleum products to the industrial sector","License Description":"This service enables the investor to export petroleum products for the industrial sector to international markets.","ISIC Number":"No data available","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Permit request","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Energy","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"* Having a valid commercial register.n* Presence of an operating license from the Saudi Authority for Industrial Cities and Technology Zones, or the Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu, or presence of each of (the municipality license, the civil defense license, and the environmental rehabilitation certificate).n* Submitting periodic reports to the Ministry of Energy and keeping documents related to the commercial activity.n* Submitting a report showing the type and quantity of the product to be exported, and the outlets to be exported from.n* Submitting a technical report by an accredited laboratory, showing the technical specifications of the products to be exported.n* The company or entity carrying out a commercial activity shall bear responsibility for the damages and losses of petroleum products resulting from violating the laws and regulations related to the practice of commercial activity.n* The company or entity shall be registered on the Ministry's website.n* The company or entity shall be licensed by the Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources.nThe company or entity shall abide by the petroleum products trading Law and its implementing regulations.nObtaining the necessary permits or licenses to practice the commercial activity.n* The commercial activity data shall be registered at the Ministry of Energy, and updated when need be, as determined by the regulatory procedures.n* Submitting the agreement contract or the purchase invoices from Saudi Aramco, or the asphalt import declaration (especially for waterproofing roll factories).n*Submitting a copy of the identity of the owner of the facility, a power of attorney, or an authorization certified by the Chamber of Commerce for the representative with a copy of his national ID.","Service Description":"Registering on the Ministry of Energy's website, and submitting a request for a permit to practice export activity.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology","License Name":"License to Provide IoT-VNO Services","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue or cancel a permit for IoT virtual communication network operator services, which are provided for the purpose of enabling automated communication between machines and devices via data communication chips (SIM), embedded data communication chips (eSIM), or any equivalent future means.","ISIC Number":"619018","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of the permit","Ministry Involved":"Communications, Space & Technology Commission","Service Fees":"100 000 SAR","Service Duration":"15 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a valid commercial register, the validity period of which is not less than 3 months.nPresence of a valid general class license, the validity period of which is not less than 6 months.nPaying the fees for issuing the required permit.nObtaning the approval of the relevant authorities in the event of cancellation of the permit.nProviding regulatory requirements for the service.nSubmitting the application through the electronic licensing system.nProviding information about the entity and its representative as well as a profile of the applicant.nProviding data of any direct or indirect ownership relations between the applicant and any service provider in the Kingdom. In such a case, the Communications, Space and Technology Commission reviews these ownership relationships, and then decides to approve or reject the application according to the conditions determined and sole discretion.nSubmitting all required documents and information in Arabic, and supporting documents (if any) can be submitted in English.nSubmitting a signed copy of any agreement for operators of virtual communications networks for the Internet of Things, or a draft thereof, an award letter, or any other similar document concluded between the applicant and any service provider in the Kingdom, provided that it is in Arabic and may be accompanied by an English translation or the original English version.nSubmitting a financial identification letter from a Saudi bank or an international bank approved by the Saudi Cenral Bank confirming that the applicant will be entitled to sufficient funding to implement the action plan submitted to the Communications, Space and Technology Commission.nSubmittibg an action plan that includes the following:n  i. u200c Corporate Strategy: presenting a high-level strategy with a statement of the method and extent of its contribution to advancing the development of the telecommunications market in the Kingdom.n  ii. Customer care service plan, after-sales services, proposed service levels, and a continuous development plan to ensure quality services.n  iv. Services: they include the applicantu2019s services and products  planned to be provided, and sectors targeted, the timing of their provision, and the proposed approach to providing innovative services of virtual communication network operators for the Internet of Things.n  v. u200cOrganizational Structure: It includes management, marketing, finance, information security, regulatory affairs and compliance, sales, customer care, operations, and technical support.n  vi. Human Resources Plan: Presentation of the detailed plan for human resources and the level of compliance with the Saudization rates established in accordance with the Kingdomu2019s laws, regulations, and legislation.n  vii. Financial Summary: Provides a financial summary of service delivery for the first 5 years of operation, including profit and loss statements, budget, statement of cash flows, financing plan, financial information for the main scenarios that govern the revenue model, bottom-up analysis of capital, and operating costs for telecom network operator services virtualization of the Internet of Things.nviii. The names of the departments and a profile of the persons authorized to handle and archive subscriber data.n Submission of the technical plan to include the following:n  i. The proposed launch date for the services.n  ii. Description and design of any planned infrastructure, systems and operations, including the following details:n        a. Network operations.n       b. Customer care, after-sales services, and suggested service levels.n        c. Monitoring the performance of services, and the continuous development of the quality of services.n       d. Subscriber bills.","Service Description":"Obtaining the permit after verifying the completeness of the documents and fulfilling the necessary conditions.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology","License Name":"Permit to Provide Global Mobile Personal Communication by Satellite Services","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue or cancel a permit for personal mobile communications services via satellite, which includes providing voice services, data/internet services, and emergency services within the Kingdom.","ISIC Number":"613011 , 613012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Permit issuance","Ministry Involved":"Communications, Space and Technology Commission","Service Fees":"5000 SAR","Service Duration":"15 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a valid commercial register, the validity period of which is not less than 3 months.nPresence of a valid general class license, the validity period of which is not less than 6 months.nPaying the fees for issuing the required permit.nObtaining the approval of the relevant authorities in the event of cancellation of the permit.nProviding regulatory requirements for the service.nSubmitting the application through the electronic licensing system.nProviding information about the entity, its representative, and an introductory profile of the applicant.nProviding a description of the services that will be provided in the Kingdom through this permit.nProviding technical specifications for the systems and devices that will be used in providing the service.nProviding service numbering requirements, if applicable.nProviding a proposed price plan for the provision of services.nSubmitting all required documents and information in Arabic, and supporting documents (if any) may be submitted in English.nSubmitting a copy of the legally binding agreement between the applicant and the operator of mobile personal communications systems and networks by satellite, to provide mobile personal communications services by satellite in the Kingdom, provided that it includes, as a minimum, the following:n  i. Names of the signatories according to the commercial register.n  ii. The duration of the agreement and its possibility of renewal.n  iii. Details of the roles and responsibilities of both parties.n  iv. The nature of the services provided.","Service Description":"Obtaining the permit after verifying the completeness of the documents and fulfilling the necessary conditions.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology","License Name":"Permit to Provide Global Mobile Personal Communication by Satellite Services","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue or cancel a permit for personal mobile communications services via satellite, which includes providing voice services, data/internet services, and emergency services within the Kingdom.","ISIC Number":"613011 , 613012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of cadres visas","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development","Service Fees":"Depending on visas","Service Duration":"14 days","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Submitting an application for cadres visas.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis step is not mandatory to issue the permit, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology","License Name":"Permit to provide telecommunications services using the VSAT system","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue or cancel a telecom service permit using the VSAT system (sending data) in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, to establish, operate and manage the necessary network and systems.","ISIC Number":"613013","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Investment","Service Fees":"2000 SAR/ yearn5 years maximum","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.nu2022 Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.nu2022 Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. nu2022 Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.nu2022 Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.nu2022 A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.nu2022 Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.nu2022 Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Provision of a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology","License Name":"Permit to provide telecommunications services using the VSAT system","License Description":"This {"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology","License Name":"Infrastructure wholesale services license","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew, cancel, and add a category to the license for wholesale services for infrastructure, which enables him to establish, own, operate, and maintain elements of the communications infrastructure, and provide his services to other service providers who have individual licenses, or to any other entity exempted from the Commission. Infrastructure elements are determined according to the categories included in the scope of the license, which are as followsnCategory A: towers and masts.nCategory B: Small Cells, Distributed Antenna Systems (DAS), In-Building Solution Systems (IBS), Wireless Access Points.nClass C: dark fibers and culverts.nCategory (D): Wholesale services for fixed data communication circuits, including connectivity services and active fixed access services.nCategory (E): International cable capacity and landing station services.","ISIC Number":"619017","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License issuance","Ministry Involved":"Communications, Space and Technology Commission","Service Fees":"100,000 SAR","Service Duration":"15 days ","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a valid commercial registration, the validity period of which is not less than 3 months.nProviding regulatory requirements for the service.nSubmitting the application through the electronic licensing system.nProviding a profile about the applicant.n Submitting documents showing that (the applicant, the owner/s, the main shareholder/s, and the parent company) jointly own a total wealth exceeding (100,000,000) SAR for all categories except category u201cBu201d, as they must own a total wealth exceeding (1,000,000) (SAR.). Alternatively, submitting a letter of financial solvency from a Saudi bank or an international bank with approval from the Saudi Central Bank, confirming that the applicant will be entitled to sufficient financing to implement the work plan submitted to the Commission.nProviding details of the ownership structure.nSubmitting an action plan for the first 5 years, which should include, at a minimum, the following:n  I. Infrastructure network deployment plans.n  II. The expected launch date of the services.n  III. A financial summary, which includes: (revenues, Capital and Operational costs, profit and loss statements, budget, statement of financial flows, financing plan, and capital structure). The presented financial information must include details of the main assumptions that govern the revenue model and bottom-up analysis of capital and operational costsn  IV. Operational plan and services, including: (services planned to be provided, products, services or targeted sectors, methodology for providing services, and any innovative services).n  V. The organizational structure, which includes: (senior management, organizational affairs, financial affairs, customer care service, specialized departments, operations, maintenance, and technical support).n  VI. {"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology","License Name":"Infrastructure wholesale services license","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew, cancel, and add a category to the license for wholesale services for infrastructure, which enables him to establish, own, operate, and maintain elements of the communications infrastructure, and provide his services to other service providers who have individual licenses, or to any other entity exempted from the Commission. {"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food facility in Modon in the absence of an existing building","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a food facility license in Modon","ISIC Number":"No data available","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a construction permit","Ministry Involved":" Saudi Authority for Industrial Cities and Technology Zones","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"1- The factory must be licensed by the Ministry of Commerce and Industry, the General Authority for Investment and free zones or the competent entities.n2- Food, drug and cosmetics factories must obtain license from the concerned entities, review and coordinate with the Saudi Food and Drug  Authority to ensure  quality of production and compliance with public health standards, and learn about health conditions in food factories and of their workers, and the requirements of pharmaceutical factories.n3- Factories with limited environmental impacts must obtain an initial assessment form, while factories with significant environmental impacts must revire  the General Authority of Meteorology and Environmental Protection when submitting an initial environmental assessment form to obtain a license, or submit a request to prepare an environmental impact study according to what the Authority deems appropriate.n4- Factories with serious environmental impacts, of which environmental pollution is feared, must obtain an environmental license from the General Authority of Meteorology and Environmental Protection or the competent bodies, after conducting an environmental impact assessment study by one of the consulting offices or research centers qualified by the General Authority for Meteorology and Protection. the environment.n5- The space required for the factory must conform with  the requirements of manufacturing and production.n6- The factory should have the minimum modern technologies in terms of  machines and manufacturing methodogies.n7- The factory site must be chosen carefully for it affects design and construction impacting effectiveness and productivity.n8- A suitable plot must be allocated in the industrial city for each industrial project after assessing it with the authority. The assessment takes into account future expansions that are justified through the presentation of a brief production planning study, giving an initial idea on the current demand and the assumed markets for disposal. ","Service Description":"Providing license issuance, modification and renewal services to enable facilities and empower individuals within the Economic cities and special zones to start real estate construction work.","Additional Information":"This procedure is partially automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Registration with relevant government entities","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social DevelopmentnThe Zakat, Tax and Customs AuthoritynSaudi Post | SPLnThe General Organization for Social Insurance","Service Fees":"Depending on the investor type","Service Duration":"Depending on the investor type","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 Presence of a valid commercial register.","Service Description":"Establishments and companies are automatically registered after Issuance of the commercial register at the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority, the General Organization for Social Insurance, and the Saudi Post.","Additional Information":"This step is illustrative and gets activated automatically"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Designation of an engineering office","Ministry Involved":"No data available","Service Fees":"Depending on the office ","Service Duration":"Depending on the office ","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Appointing of an approved engineering office to obtain construction and safety plans in accordance with the Saudi code.","Additional Information":"This step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Site Approval","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant ","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Obtaining the approval of the planning authority in the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing on the site on which the activity shall be established.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nThis step can be skipped if a warehouse or part of a warehouse is rented."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a Construction permit","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH ","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant ","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of an updated electronic instrument from the Ministry of Justice, a housing contract, or an investment contract.nPresence of a survey report for the purpose of building.nPresence of an insurance against hidden defects in case the building requires it.nPayment of the service fee.nHiring a designer from an engineering office.nHiring a supervisor from an engineering office.nHiring a building contractor.","Service Description":"Obtaining a construction license to carry out construction works.","Additional Information":"This procedure is partially automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nPeriodic inspections of construction procedures are carried out by the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing.nThis step can be skipped if a warehouse or part of a warehouse is rented."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Connecting water and electricity","Ministry Involved":"Saudi Electricity CompanynNational Water Company","Service Fees":"Depending on the facility ","Service Duration":"Undefined ","Conditions/Requirements":"Preparing the meter installation site according to the company's technical requirements, and removing the cables according to the approved sizes.nImplementing a thermal insulation according to the company's requirements.nImplementing a grounding system.","Service Description":"Connecting water and electricity services upon 75%  completion of the construction work, in accordance with the instructions and requirements specified.","Additional Information":"This procedure is partially automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nPeriodic inspections of construction procedures are carried out by the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing.nThis step can be skipped if a warehouse or part of a warehouse is rented."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an occupancy certificate","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH","Service Fees":"400 SAR + Survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant ","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a construction license.nPayment of service feesnHiring an engineering office.","Service Description":"Issuance of a certificate documenting the facilities' compliance with safety requirements and standards.","Additional Information":"This procedure is partially automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nThis step can be skipped if a warehouse or part of a warehouse is rented."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Field inspection to check the safety of the building","Ministry Involved":"Civil Defense ","Service Fees":"150 SAR","Service Duration":"Undefined ","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Ensuring the application of and compliance to safety requirements and security instructions.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of  a license to practice commercial activity and a safety permit","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAHnCivil Defense ","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"5 days ","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a valid commercial register.nPresence of a permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.nPresence of the articles of association for companies.nPresence of the title deed or lease contract if there is an office.nApplicant shall not be prohibited from practicing the activity.nApplicant shall be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.nApplicant shall be committed to updating the data in the system.nApplicant shall be able to request the issuance of a license for his shop on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the Power of attorney.nAttached documents shall match the original copies.nApplicant shall ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions through the beneficiary's account are binding.","Service Description":"Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data required to conduct the  activity, and inspecting the site to to ensure it is licensed in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Registration in the electronic system","Ministry Involved":"SFDA","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"One day ","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Opening an account in the Unified Electronic System (Ghad) to obtain the favility's account number.","Additional Information":"nThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License Issuance ","Ministry Involved":"SFDA","Service Fees":"1000 SAR","Service Duration":"2 Days","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a valid commercial register.nPresence of a municipal license for factories located outside industrial cities.nPresence of an operating license from the Saudi Authority for Industrial Cities and Technology Zones for factories within industrial cities.nPresence of the lease contract of the rented warehouse. nCompliance with the following standard specifications:n- Gulf Technical Regulation No. GSO 168 (Requirements for Stores for Preserving Dry and Packaged Foods).n- Gulf Technical Regulation No. GSO 323 (General requirements for transporting and storing refrigerated and frozen foods).n- Gulf Technical Regulation No. GSO 969 (Warehouses for Freezing and Cooling Foods - Part Two: General Requirements).n- Gulf Standard Specifications No. 968 GSO (Warehouses for Freezing and Refrigerating Foods - Part One: Definitions, Classification and Terminology).n- Gulf Standard Specifications No. GSO 21 (Hygienic conditions in food factories and their employees).n- Gulf Standard Specifications No. GSO 9 (labeling of packaged foods).","Service Description":"Issuance of the license after paying the fees and ensuring completion of documents and application of the quality standards.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA)","License Name":"Licensing a food warehouse in the absence of an existing building within the scope of the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for a warehouse that stores foods.","ISIC Number":"521098, 521093, 521091","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of visas for cadres","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development","Service Fees":"Depending on visas","Service Duration":"14 days ","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Submitting an application for cadres visas.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nThis step is not required to issue the license, but is required to run the activity."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources","License Name":"Licensing an industrial facility in the event of the absence of an existing building in the Economic Cities and Special Zones Authority","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue, renew, amend and cancel the license. It also enable him to provide services for the purpose of establishing facilities of all kinds within the economic cities and special zones and start practicing the activity.","ISIC Number":"No data available","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an investment license","Ministry Involved":"Economic Cities and Special Zones Authority","Service Fees":"25,000 SAR","Service Duration":"5 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of a commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by the competent authorities and the Saudi embassy.nPresence of a reserved trade name.nPresence of articles of association for the limited liability company and the joint stock company.nSubmission of the partners' decision, which indicates their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the names of the partners, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of the activity.nSubmission of a copy of the passport of the general manager.nProvision of a copy of the national ID and family card, if one of the partners is a Saudi citizen.nSubmission of an extract from the civil status.nProvision of an initial approval from the relevant ministries or entities if the activity requires approval.nProvision of a detailed action plan.nSubmission of a minimum 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, approved by an accounting office and certified by the relevant body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy, to show the soundness of the financial position.nThe investor should have a good commercial reputation, and he should not have been previously convicted of any violation or crime.nApplicant must comply with all laws and regulations in force in Economic Cities in particular and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in general.nThe activity to be invested in should be added to the Articles of Association when branches of the facility are opened , provided that the period of establishing the parent facility is not less than one year.nThe project should not be included in the list of excluded activities from foreign investment.nAn activity within different sectors must be added in one application, with the exception of activities that are subsidiary to the main activity, and are in the same sector or are complementary to the sub-activity of the facility.nThe signatures of the decision makers in the Chamber of Commerce should be added for  approval of the post-incorporation decision.nApplicant must ensure the completion of government registrations and the validity of their documents and certificates (social insurance certificate, zakat or tax certificate, Saudization certificate, and the license of the Ministry of Investment for a foreign facility, if any).nFor some activities, initial approval or licenses must be obtained from other government entities, or from where they are represented in the Economic Cities Authority.nTo obtain a site in the Economic City in coordination with the main developer of the concerned city.nAppoint a general manager and determine his authority, and have it certified by relevant authorities and the Saudi embassy.nThe financial ability to invest must be demonstrated in proportion to the capital of the project and the share of each partner, in accordance with the action plan submitted.nThe minimum capital must be met for specialized activities carried out by mixed and foreign establishments.nOne of the following legal representation methods shall be met in case a facility representative is appointed:nA Power of attorney approved by relevant authorities.nAn authorization approved by the Chamber of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuance of an investment license for an industrial facility for non-Saudis in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

of a commercial complex activity license","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"General requirements:nu2022 Presence of a valid Entry and exit shall be from the side of the commercial street only (emergency exits shall be opened on secondary streets).nu2022 It shall not be allowed to make entrances or exits at street intersections. The distance between the corner of the site at the main intersection to the axis of the entrance or exit shall not be less than 35 meters to prevent causing traffic obstruction at the intersection.nObtaining the approval of the competent authority for sites that are not designated for uses, such as commercial centers in the structural plans in cities and villages, according to the instructions regulating this.nThe length of the land facade on the commercial streets shall not be less than 50 m.nA feasibility study for the project shall be prepared, showing the objectives and expected results for large projects that site area is not less than 10,000 square meters.nThe minimum area of u200bu200bthe site shall not be less than 3000 square meters.nA car park for each store in the complex or commercial center shall be provided.nA parking for the visitors of the center shall be provided at the rate of one car park for every 50 square meters of the total area allocated for the commercial use of the center.n Parking lots shall be allocated for people with disabilities from 5% of the public parking lots, with a minimum of two parking spaces, provided that they are close to the entrances of the market, and the parking lots for people with disabilities shall be marked with their logo, and the area allocated for their cars shall not be less than 25 square meters, according to the dimensions shown for the requirements of the municipality services related to the people with disabilities issued from the  Ministry's Agency of Technical Affairs.nThe height of the entrance roof and the ceiling of the basement shall not be less than 2.5m in the event of implementing parking lots in the basement.nSpecial requirements:nu2022 The municipal and technical requirements for public shops shall be met.nu2022 The requirements of commercial panels shall be met.","Service Description":"Issuance of a license for commercial complexes, which are large closed markets with multiple floors, containing various activities such as shops, entertainment, and restaurants.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Municipality","License Name":"License for a shopping mall activity ","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for commercial complexes, which are large closed markets with multiple floors, containing various activities such as shops, entertainment, and restaurants.","ISIC Number":"471930","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial activity license and safety certificate","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAHnCivil Defense","Service Fees":"Depending on the classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"5 days","Conditions/Requirements":"Having a valid commercial register.nHaving permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.nPresence of articles of association for companies.nPresence of the title deed or lease contract in the case of an office.n Applicant must not be prohibited from practicing the activity.nApplicant must be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.nApplicant must be committed to updating the data in the system.nApplicant must be able to request the issuance of a license for their shop on their own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal body.nApplicant must ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding on him.nThe attached documents shall match the original copies.","Service Description":"Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site that shall be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing","License Name":"Headquarters activity License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.","ISIC Number":"701012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Investment ","Service Fees":"2000 SAR/ yearn5 years maximum","Service Duration":"One Day","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.nu2022 Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.nu2022 Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. nu2022 Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.nu2022 Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.nu2022 A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.nu2022 Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.nu2022 Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Provision of a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"A value of 10,000 SAR shall be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing","License Name":"Headquarters activity License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.","ISIC Number":"701012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial register","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Commerce","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification","Service Duration":"Depending on the entity classification","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022Applicant must be 18 years old or above.nu2022The employee must not be a governmental employee.nu2022The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.nu2022It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.nIssuing the main register requires the following:nu2022 Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.nu2022 Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.nu2022 Presence of a national ID.nIssuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:nu2022Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.nu2022Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.nIssuing a branch register requires:nu2022 Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.nu2022 Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.","Service Description":"A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official license in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing","License Name":"Headquarters activity License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.","ISIC Number":"701012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Registration with government entities","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social DevelopmentnThe Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority,nSaudi Post | SPLnThe General Organization for Social Insurance ","Service Fees":"Depending on the investor type","Service Duration":"Depending on the investor type","Conditions/Requirements":"Having a valid commercial register.","Service Description":"Establishments and companies are automatically registered after issuing the commercial register at the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development,ZATCA,the General Organization for Social Insurance, and the Saudi Post.","Additional Information":"This step is illustrative and gets activated automatically"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing","License Name":"Headquarters activity License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.","ISIC Number":"701012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of safety equipment certificate","Ministry Involved":"No data available","Service Fees":"No data available","Service Duration":"No data available","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"A document obtained by the owner of the facility to prove the provision of all necessary safety equipments, including firefighting equipment, etc.","Additional Information":"This step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance.nThis step is taken by the investor if the area of u200bu200bthe shop is less than 930 square meters, as the activity is classified as instant."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing","License Name":"Headquarters activity License","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.","ISIC Number":"701012","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Request to issue a license to practice an economic activity","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH nCivil Defense","Service Fees":"Depending on the facility area","Service Duration":"5 days","Conditions/Requirements":"General requirements:nu2022 Presence of a valid commercial register.nu2022 Having a construction license.nu2022The activity license shall be placed in a prominent place in the store, and it is forbidden to use it for other than the purpose for which it was allocated.nu2022 The activity shall not be changed and the area of u200bu200bthe shop shall not be modified by increasing or decreasing it without obtaining the approval of the competent municipality.nu2022 The shop shall not be connected to a residence or another place.nu2022 Shops shall not be exploited in activities disturbing comfort or harmful to public health or the environment.nu2022 A lease contract shall be submitted if the applicant is a tenant.nu2022 Commitment to meet the requirements of persons with disabilities in order to facilitate their movement, and to create appropriate conditions, dimensions and spaces for them in accordance with the standards of commercial establishments and the Saudi Building Code.nnSite requirements:nu2022  Car parks shall ","Service Description":"Submitting a license application to the headquarters upon fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site to be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"* This step requires adding an account on Balady platform.n* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of u200bu200bthe shop is less than or equal to 150 square meters, and includes shops and workshops.n* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of u200bu200bthe store is less than or equal to 465 square meters, and includes restaurants and the similarities.n* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of u200bu200bthe shop is less than or equal to 930 square meters, and includes office activities.n* Some activities require the submission of a safety technical report, others require a safety equipment invoice.n* Some activities require a cleaning contract, and it depends on the municipalities and settings in the municipality, as it can be read from the Balady platform."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing","License Name":"nHome furnishing retail activity license","License Description":"This service enables the investor to issue a license to retail new home furniture.","ISIC Number":"475910","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Request to issue a license to practice an economic activity","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAHnCivil Defense","Service Fees":"Depending on the facility area","Service Duration":"5 days","Conditions/Requirements":"General requirements:nu2022 Presence of a valid commercial register.nu2022 Having a construction license.nu2022The activity license shall be placed in a prominent place in the store, and it is forbidden to use it for other than the purpose for which it was allocated.nu2022 The activity shall not be changed and  the area of u200bu200bthe shop shall not be modified by increasing or decreasing it without obtaining the approval of the competent municipality.nu2022 The shop shall not be connected to a residence or another place.nu2022 Shops shall not be exploited in activities disturbing comfort or harmful to public health or the environment.nu2022 The lease contract shall be submitted if the applicant is a tenant.nu2022 Commitment to meet the requirements of persons with disabilities in order to facilitate their movement, and to create appropriate conditions, dimensions and spaces for them in accordance with the standards of commercial facilities and the Saudi Building Code.nSite requirements:nu2022 The location shall be on a commercial street with a ground floor, or a ground floor and mezzanine, and it could be within the frequent floors of commercial buildings, with certain conditions and the approval of the competent municipality.nu2022 The area of u200bu200bthe store shall not be less than 24 square metres, and the width of the fau00e7ade shall not be less than 4 square metres.nu2022 Car parks at the rate of one car park per 25 square meters shall be provided, with a minimum of one car per site.nu2022 The activity shall be in the commercial and mixed buildings (commercial and residential) in the event that the shops are closed in the city, and the activity is happening in a part of the building.nu2022 The location shall be in the logistics area or the warehouse area in the event that the closed shops are outside the urban bloc, and the activity is happening in a part of the building or a separate location.nu2022 The location should be on the commercial streets in case the shops are closed, and the activity is within a part of the building.nu2022 The activity shall be on the available streets, within the logistics services area or the warehouse area in case the stores are closed, and the activity is within a separate location.nu2022 One parking lot for every 70 square meters shall be provided in the event that the closed shops are in a separate site.nu2022 It is not required to provide parking spaces if the closed shops are within a part of the building.nu2022 Kiosks and malls shall be allowed if the stores are closed in the city, and the activity is happening in independent locations.nnnSpecial requirements:nu2022 The municipal and technical requirements for public shops shall be met. (Link)nu2022 The means of electronic payment shall be provided before carrying out the activity.nu2022 The requirements of commercial panels shall be met. (Link)nu2022 It is not allowed to provide direct services to customers except through the delivery service if the stores are closed.nu2022 The requirements of closed stores shall be met. (Link)","Service Description":"A request for a license to sell home furnishings to individuals upon fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site to be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"* This step requires adding an account on Balady platform.n* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety license in the event that the area of u200bu200bthe shop is less than or equal to 150 square meters, and includes shops and workshops.n The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of u200bu200bthe store is less than or equal to 465 square meters, and includes restaurants and the like.n* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety license in the event that the area of u200bu200bthe shop is less than or equal to 930 square meters, and includes office activities.n* Some activities require the submission of a safety technical report, others require a safety equipment invoice.n* Some activities require a cleaning contract, and it depends on the municipalities and settings in the municipality, as it can be read from the Balady platform."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance an investment license for the foreign investor","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Investment","Service Fees":"2000 SR / yearn5 years maximum","Service Duration":"One day","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.nu2022 Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.nu2022 Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.nu2022 Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.nu2022 Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. nu2022 Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.nu2022 Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.nu2022 A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.nu2022 Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.nu2022 Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.nu2022 Presence of the general manager's passport.nu2022 Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.nu2022 Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.nu2022 Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.nu2022 Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.nu2022 Provision of a detailed action plan.nu2022 Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdomu2019s embassy.nu2022 Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.nu2022 Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.","Service Description":"Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years / yearnThis procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis action requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial register","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Commerce","Service Fees":"Depending on the entity classification","Service Duration":"Depending on the entity classification","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022Applicant must be 18 years old or above.nu2022The employee must not be a governmental employee.nu2022The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.nu2022It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.nIssuing the main register requires the following:nu2022 Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.nu2022 Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.nu2022 Presence of a national ID.nIssuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:nu2022Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.nu2022Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.nIssuing a branch register requires:nu2022 Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.nu2022 Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.","Service Description":"A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis action requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Registration with government entities","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Human Resources and Social DevelopmentnThe Zakat, Tax and Customs AuthoritynSaudi PostnThe General Organization for Social Insurance","Service Fees":"Depending on the investor type","Service Duration":"Depending on the investor type","Conditions/Requirements":"u2022 Presence of a valid commercial register.","Service Description":"Establishments and companies are automatically registered after issuing the commercial registration at the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority, the General Organization for Social Insurance and the Saudi Post.","Additional Information":"This Step is illustrative and gets activated automatically.n"}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Designation of an engineering office","Ministry Involved":"No data available","Service Fees":"Depending on the office ","Service Duration":"Depending on the office ","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Appointment of an approved engineering office to obtain construction and safety plans in accordance with the Saudi code.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Site Approval","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH","Service Fees":"Depending on the activity classification + survey fees  20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Obtaining the approval of the planning authority in the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing on the site on which the activity shall be established.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated.nThis action requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a construction License","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH","Service Fees":"Depending on the classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"Presence of an updated electronic deed from the Ministry of Justice, a housing contract, or an investment contract.nPresence of a survey report for the purpose of construction.nHiring a designer from an engineering office.nHiring a supervisor from an engineering office.nHiring a construction contractor.nImplementating  thermal insulation.nPaying the service fee.","Service Description":"Obtaining a construction permit to carry out construction works.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment.nAn engineering office is selected through the Balady platform, and the plans are approved by the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing.nPeriodic inspections of construction procedures are carried out by the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Connecting water and electricity","Ministry Involved":"Water companynSaudi Electricity Company","Service Fees":"Depending on the facility","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Connecting water and electricity services upon completion of 75% of the construction work, according to the instructions and specified requirements.","Additional Information":"Periodic inspections of construction procedures are carried out by the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing.nThis procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of  an occupancy certificate","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAH","Service Fees":"400 riyals + survey fee 20 SAR","Service Duration":"Instant","Conditions/Requirements":"nContracting with an engineering office.nPay the service fee.nHaving a building permit.","Service Description":"Issuing a certificate of authenticity of the facilities' compliance with safety requirements and standards.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"License application","Ministry Involved":"Ministry of Tourism","Service Fees":"Free","Service Duration":"5 days ","Conditions/Requirements":"Having a valid commercial register.nHaving a Municipal license.nHaving a civil defense license.nPresence of a branding compatible with the specifications described in the relevant legal procedures evidence.nThe presence of a letter from Shomoos proving the linking process.nActivating the facility's account in the national tourism monitoring platform.nAuthorizing the representative of the tourist accommodation facility to deal with the Ministry during or after the licensing period around the clock.nProviding STAR requirements in the building.nAvailability of classification criteria at least (economy) for the facilities classified in classes.nApproval of the undertaking in the licenses portal.nTo be a Saudi national or a foreign investor holding a valid and legal license.nOne shall not have been previously convicted of a crime orejudicial to honor or inyrgrity, unless he has been rehabilitated.nThe license shall not have been previously revoked due to violating the system regulations, except after the lapse of 5 years from submitting the application.","Service Description":"Submitting an application to obtain a license according to the activity.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.nThis procedure is automated."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Field inspection to check the safety of the building","Ministry Involved":"Civil Defense","Service Fees":"150 SAR","Service Duration":"Undefined","Conditions/Requirements":"No data available","Service Description":"Ensuring the application of safety requirements and adherence to security instructions.","Additional Information":"This procedure requires payment."}"}

{"Licensing Entity Name":"Ministry of Tourism","License Name":"Licensing tourist accommodation facilities","License Description":"This service enables the investor to provide licensing services for hotels, serviced apartments, camps, inns, cabin hotels, and chalets.","ISIC Number":"551041, 551071, 551043 ,552001 ,551025 , 551011","Services Required":"{"Service Name":"Issuance of a commercial activity license and safety certificate","Ministry Involved":"MOMRAHn","Service Fees":"Depending on the classification + survey fees of 20 SAR","Service Duration":"5 days ","Conditions/Requirements":"Having a valid commercial register.nHaving a permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.nPresence of articles of association for companies.nPresence of the title deed or lease contract in the case of presence of an office.n One shall not be prohibited from practicing the activity.nTo be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.nTo be committed to updating the data in the system.nTo be able to request the issuance of a license for his store on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal agency.nOne shall ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding on him.nThe attached documents shall match original copies.","Service Description":"Fulfilling all procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the activity and inspecting the site that shall be operated to license it in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.","Additional Information":"This procedure is automated.nThis procedure requires payment."}"}
